channel.title: Need help with my server? It wont update! ='(
channel.description: On my new server i went on the source hit runserver and then went on silabsoft client and logged in, loved the server so changed some things, i logged out and went into my source and went to character log and changed my player rights to 3 and then save and compiled all good so far, then i went into client.java folder and edited it and changed like butt loads of stuff took me forever! u see the source is called Homiescape so i typed in Ctrl+F and then typed in Homiescape and changed everything i found to <myservername>scape. then I changed loads of the messages that npc say and then i saved and compiled, only had on error saying that an expression can't start with " = " and then I went to go on again and everything is the same thing as it was before except the fact Im a owner! WTH how can i fix it?!

item.title: Need help with my server? It wont update! ='(
item.dc:creator: @Darksterlin Darksterlin
item.description:
@Darksterlin wrote:

Xaros:

Delete that “=”?

I can’t find it, been looking for it for like 30 mins!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my server? It wont update! ='(

item.title: Need help with my server? It wont update! ='(
item.dc:creator: @EpicThunder EpicThunder
item.description:
@EpicThunder wrote:

If there is an error, it will not compile. You must first remove said error, then you can compile and get it to work mate

Read full topic

On my new server i went on the source hit runserver and then went on silabsoft client and logged in, loved the server so changed some things, i logged out and went into my source and went to character log and changed my player rights to 3 and then save and compiled all good so far, then i went into client.java folder and edited it and changed like butt loads of stuff took me forever! u see the source is called Homiescape so i typed in Ctrl+F and then typed in Homiescape and changed everything i found to scape. then I changed loads of the messages that npc say and then i saved and compiled, only had on error saying that an expression can’t start with " = " and then I went to go on again and everything is the same thing as it was before except the fact Im a owner! WTH how can i fix it?!
